text: Platanthera deflexilabella is a species of plant in the family Orchidaceae. It is endemic to Sichuan Province of China. == Sources == * China Plant Specialist Group 2004. Platanthera deflexilabella. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 23 August 2007. title: Platanthera deflexilabella
